Mina Harker.name: Mina Harker
Mina Harker.role: Framing narrator of the journal compilation, Jonathan Harker's fiancée to whom he intends to share recipes and travel stories

Jonathan Harker.name: Jonathan Harker
Jonathan Harker.role: Solicitor traveling to Transylvania on business to meet Count Dracula, narrator of the journal

Count Dracula.name: Count Dracula
Count Dracula.role: Nobleman residing in Transylvania, Jonathan Harker's host and business associate, author of the welcoming letter
